channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: The starting salary for a new American Airlines flight attendant is low enough to qualify for food stamps in some states
item.description: Legislation prevents workers from striking without permission from the government.

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Cyberattacks are soaring—and more lucrative for criminals than drugs. It's time to treat them as an 'act of war', health care exec warns
item.description: Cybercrime profits now surpass "all of the illegal drug trafficking in the world combined," Verily CEO Stephen Gillett said at Fortune's Brainstorm Health conference.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Jamie Dimon shocks Wall Street, hinting at his retirement in the next five years and reciting a laundry list of red flags about the global economy
item.description: Dimon says he’s “cautiously pessimistic” about the future of inflation, spending, and the geopolitical landscape.

item.title: The Power of Clicks, Likes, and Shares: Promote the Right Kind of Financial Content
item.description: Not all financial content creators on social media are created equal. A broad differentiation can be made between influencers, knowledge sharers, and aspiring thought leaders.

item.title: Tech companies are voluntarily agreeing to an AI ‘kill switch’ to prevent Terminator-style risks as some regulators remain hesitant to flex their legal muscles
item.description: Developers and governments reach consensus, but “toothless” commitments fall short of formal global legal frameworks.

item.title: Why the New T+1 Settlement Cycle Matters: A Global Index Provider’s Perspective
item.description: Shorter settlement periods are meant to protect market participants. But the new T+1 settlement cycle for US equities may have undesirable knock-on effects for financial market participants around the world, including index fund managers.

item.title: Health care workforce challenges must be addressed to support Black mothers
item.description: In order to serve Black mothers, the healthcare workforce must properly focus on diversity, equity, and inclusion.
